But i have one problem with bringing out the dead - i can play movie wit wmp and VCL perfect, but when i try to play it on standalone dvd player audio is not in sync! what can i do? this happens also with raging bull big_dad_e.

Are you using DVDFlick to burn?  It is what I prefer and it's free & opersource. Edit title> Edit Audio tracks> Select: Ignore audio delay for this track.  Also sometimes if you fast-forward the DVD and rewind, it will self correct.
DVDFlick: http://www.dvdflick.net/
DVDFlick uses ImgBurn.
Thank you for answering. I will try with DVDflick. I am using Nero 10 for burning.
I also put it on USB and play it but audio was out of sync.
